actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elephant makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 16 (2d10+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. _Hit:_ 14 (2d8+5) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the elephant moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the elephant can make one Stomp attack against it as a bonus action.
